website_summaries.verdict: An economical pan that will stand the test of time.
pros: Nonstick surface lasts long-term and makes pizza removal clean and easy
cons: Nonstick fades away after going through a dishwasher

customer_reviews.title: No more soggy crust
customer_reviews.text: I love getting frozen and deli pizzas but I hated how unless I cooked them directly on the oven rack the center crust would be soggy. They would stick to the rack and drip making a mess most of the time. This pizza pan is a life saver. I got this one because it's bigger than the other ones I was looking at. It has fit every pizza that I've put on it so far. I get golden crunchy crust throughout and all the pizzas slide right off. I only hand wash it but it's holding up great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Loribelle

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza pan and Teen-proof!
customer_reviews.text: This pan is exactly what I was looking for. It is made of a metal that absorbs the heat very well and along with this, the holes ensure a nice crust. Many other pans are made of a cheap aluminum which does not absorb the heat well enough to get a crisp pizza crust. As for the non-stick surface, it is very durable. My teens have used a metal pizza cutter several times and it has held up well. I have since hidden the metal pizza cutter as telling a teen not to do something repeatedly does not always ensure the result you are looking for:)
customer_reviews.author: xBryMilx

customer_reviews.title: Makes nice, crispy pizzas
customer_reviews.text: We bake a frozen pizza once a week, as that is my son's favorite dinner (yuck). Our old pan, also with holes, wore out, so we needed a new one. My husband had bought one at the local store and it made soft, mushy pizzas that we all didn't like. So, I found this one. The holes in the pan allow the heat and air to get through the bottom of the crust, allowing for a nice, crispy crust. We have really like how the pizzas back on this pan.
customer_reviews.author: E. Block

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pan, I keeps the pizza crust from being soggy and it’s very easy to clean. Truly, the only downside is that when trying to cut the pizza, it slides around because the pan is pretty slick. But that’s manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Ballew

customer_reviews.title: If you want durability out of your pizza pan and an even cook
customer_reviews.text: I have now baked 4 or so home made pizza's on this pan. I even cut them on the pan which is not recommended because of the scratches. I must say I don't have a scratch on it yet. It's held up very well. My pizza crust turns out very even and nearly perfect every time now and I'm a complete novice to pizza making. No need to preheat the Pan and it seems to cool down very quickly as well. I would recommend this if you do not want to risk going with a pizza stone. It's very durable and works extremely well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Sullentrop

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 and both warped and dirty
customer_reviews.text: Bought 1 and it was slightly warped and wouldn’t sit flat. Set up an exchange and the replacement is much worse. Very warped and dirty (a brown substance on the bottom, seen in the pictures). Not sure if it’s a Calphalon or Amazon issue.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: It was similar in that it has the openings in the bottom which creates a nice crust on the pizza
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pizza pan to replace one I had from Farberware. It was similar in that it has the openings in the bottom which creates a nice crust on the pizza. No need to heat up the dough and then place sauce, cheese toppings. etc on later and heat again. I also purchased it because of the size 14" which creates a good size pizza with 8 slices. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that my Farberware pan had two little extension handles on each side which made it easier to turn and remove from the oven.
customer_reviews.author: valerie rovegno

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Fits a 16" take and bake pizza and ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Fits a 16" take and bake pizza and has holes so the crust gets crispy. So glad I bought this so I can stop trashing the inside of my oven.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Helfer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible pizza pans! I really like this brand but not this item. Bought these pans to replace my 18 year old pizza pans. I have tried these 6 times now and they do not cook evenly. I've been preparing pizzas for years from scratch. Dont waste your money on these.
customer_reviews.author: C.L.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've cooked around 300+ pizzas with this and the teflon coating is holding up pretty well. I only use the blue Scotch-Brite non-scratch scouring pads to clean it and transfer the pizza to a cookie sheet before cutting it. The rolled edges are rusting a little from occasionally sitting in the sink too long but I probably have a few years of use left in it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Wood

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Loved how the pizza just slides off and when I started to clean it, the stuck food just came off with just a look. Lol, I was holding it sideways and when I touched to see, whatever was stuck just slid off. Amazing, wish I had bought it much earlier.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Avoid the mess of heating frozen pizza in your oven.
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these nonstick, perforated pizza pans and they are great for heating frozen pizza. Instructions always say to put your pizza directly on the middle grill of the oven and that can be very, very messy. These pizza pans are great because you avoid the mess, while heating your pizza evenly and as per the instructions since they are perforated. Very happy with these pans. Totally recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: ACHA

customer_reviews.title: 100% solid buy must have!
customer_reviews.text: Throw all other pizza pans away. You wont need another one. This thing is awesome. I simply wipe it with a napkin after I am done and thats it. Nothing sticks to it. 100% solid amazon buy!
customer_reviews.author: Bellworx

customer_reviews.title: These work great, but like all non-stick products
customer_reviews.text: These work great, but like all non-stick products, the non-stick aspect doesn't last long. I continue to use these, but have to cut a circular piece of parchment and place that on the pan before I spread the pizza dough on them. With that adjustment, they continue to work great (as would any other pizza pan, I guess?)
customer_reviews.author: David P

customer_reviews.title: Good pizza pan-bakes evenly
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these now and even with 3, sometimes it feels like I don't have enough pizza pans once I get the kitchen going when we host pizza making parties for friends and neighbors. Despite of the non-stick coating, the pizzas will stick after a certain number of uses. If the pizza sticks, just use an oil spray to gently coat the pan before laying the pizza dough on it. pros: heats evenly, good size, easy to clean cons: wish these were made heavier as they tend to warp in the high heat but return to their original shape after cooling, not made in the USA
customer_reviews.author: pacifico

customer_reviews.title: This is the best pizza pan I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pizza pan I have purchased. Unfortunately it doesn't seem to come in 18" diameter which you need for a family size pizza. I have tried other brands in 18", but none are as good as this one. Come on, Calphalon, make an 18" pan.
customer_reviews.author: Charie Brown

customer_reviews.title: ... about a month now and it cleans up very easily. I've just used it for pizzas and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pan about a month now and it cleans up very easily. I've just used it for pizzas and it doesn't discolor / degrade nearly as quickly as your average cookie sheet / pizza pan.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Alcorn

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't work as well as I'd hoped for keeping ...
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work as well as I'd hoped for keeping crusts crispy and not soggy. I think it needs to be more of a mesh screen, rather than just holes in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen S.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans up great.
customer_reviews.text: I just wish I'd bought a smaller version (14"?). This one barely fits in my oven. I think most people who have mentioned clean-up problems have overheated their pan at one time or another.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had one of these and I borrowed it and when I gave it back I went straight online to order one just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Should Have One!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best kitchen gadgets I have ever purchased. Cooks pizzas to perfection...even the gluten-free crusts turn out well. I even warmed large burrito-size tortillas in the oven with it and they turned out the best!
customer_reviews.author: Mount Up!

customer_reviews.title: I use this mostly for frozen pizza. With some ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this mostly for frozen pizza. With some store brands of rectangular sliced pizza, cheese on the edges melt and stick the slice to the pan. I also used this for some cinnamon buns, but beware if there is cinnamon on the bottom of the buns, it can drizzle through the pin holes onto the oven floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pizza Pan
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely NO stick. This also bakes the best Pizza. We always removed Pizza from Pan before cutting it. The Pizza just slides right off. If you are pondering; BUY it Or NOT! I Say Buy It.
customer_reviews.author: JstBre_007

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Used the pan a few times for frozen pizzas. The pan is already warped. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: C Knight

customer_reviews.title: The missing piece for great pizza
customer_reviews.text: finally found what I needed to get a really crispy crust. works great and pizza slides right off
customer_reviews.author: Nico angel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for frozen pizzas or homemade pizza
customer_reviews.text: I already had one of these, only teflon on the top though. This one is teflon on both sides and cleans up much easier! I need to ditch the old one and buy a second one of these pans. Perfect for frozen pizzas or homemade pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: It's really good for baking pizza for my family. It easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this pan and use it for everything! It makes everything very crispy. Yummy! Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Great for frozen pizzas!
customer_reviews.text: Great for frozen pizzas! no oven mess and no soggy crust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best pizza pan, ever!
customer_reviews.text: Great pan. I had one for 15 years and it was great but it was time for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Myers

customer_reviews.title: ... another one of these and made the huge and stupid mistake to put it in the oven when it ...
customer_reviews.text: I had another one of these and made the huge and stupid mistake to put it in the oven when it was on the cleaning cycle. Got destroyed. Will be smarter with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Icicle4

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pan
customer_reviews.text: This truly has been non-stick. Don't rinse off in cool water right away, but I quickly wipe with a sponge and then clean later as needed. Have used several times for big and small pizzas. Leaves no cooked on residue yet. Do not treat with cooking spray, as instructions say.
customer_reviews.author: gleaner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great surface for homemade pizza. my hub is onto something here,, making dyno pizzas with this great pan.
customer_reviews.author: lesley brar

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza pan
customer_reviews.text: This pizza pan is just the thing we needed. It has holes in the bottom which lets the pizza cook faster and crispier! It's also non-stick so our pizza is intact and the pan is easy to keep clean. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alabama Nanny

customer_reviews.title: Good for sandwiches and pizza
customer_reviews.text: Toasted open face sandwiches on it today and the holes really help keep the bread from getting soggy. Primary purpose is heating pizza, and that worked well, too! Doesn't stick.
customer_reviews.author: MGS425

customer_reviews.title: Great non-stick surface as long as you take proper care of it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent non-stick pizza pan. DO NOT use your pizza cutter on this pan. It will quickly take off the non-stick coating down to the bare metal and cause the pan to start to rust.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Great for low carb pizzas!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent pizza pan. My husband and I have gone low carb and this pan helps us to crisp up the low carb pizza crusts. Very easy to clean and works great!
customer_reviews.author: S. Vassello

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza pan!
customer_reviews.text: Makes the pizza crust so crispy! I do not even have to grease the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Definitely an upgrade for myself without breaking the bank for take-n-bakes
customer_reviews.text: I was using a cheap pizza pan from WalMart for years and couldn't get digornos, kirkland signature take-n-bake or anything of the sort to get the crust cripty on the bottom of the pizza. This made an absolute huge difference, no more doughy take-n-bakes.
customer_reviews.author: COTK

customer_reviews.title: It is is easy to wipe clean when finished
customer_reviews.text: The product feels durable and high quality. The crust is noticeably crispier when using this pan vs. a regular pizza pan. It is is easy to wipe clean when finished.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great! It hasn't warped, I used it 4 times already at 450 degrees F.
customer_reviews.author: Snoopy

customer_reviews.title: Pan warped after first few uses
customer_reviews.text: This pan gets a lot of use in our household. Even though after the first few uses the pan warped. That is our only issue with this pan.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Noyes

customer_reviews.title: It works great and is easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months ago and have made multiple pizzas with it. It works great and is easy to clean. Everything I expect of Calphalon brand!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice pizza pan
customer_reviews.text: Calphalon products are always high-quality and dependable. This pizza pan is non-stick and works great.

customer_reviews.title: Cooks Pizza Very Evenly!
customer_reviews.text: It cooks the Pizza very evenly and makes the crust crisoy on the outside but still soft inside!

customer_reviews.title: the best quality value on line
customer_reviews.text: If you make your own pizza or just bake a frozen one, you cant beat this. I pre spray with vegetable oil and the cooked pizza slides off!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for re-heating leftover pizza, this pan has air-circulation holes that allow the bottom of the pie to stay firm and crisp. The finish is easy to clean, also.

customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this pan! Works well with homemade pizza & store bought. I tried to order another but it was unavailable.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: great product. Cleans up easily via hand wash or dishwasher. Currently we use this with pizzas purchased at a take and bake place here, but I would not hesitate to use this pan on pizza made at home.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Both homemade and reheated pizza come out great. Cleaning it is a breeze. I previously had a traditional pizza stone and would never go back

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy I purchased this Pizza Pan
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I purchased this Pizza Pan. The perforations on the bottom really make for the crust to come out just perfect - not soggy, nor too crispy. I've received so many compliments from my guests when I bake a pizza on this. I would highly recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Pizza slides right off!
customer_reviews.text: Pizza crust is CRISP! Easy to clean! Really nice pizza pans. Had the old ones for years and finally upgraded. Years of cutting the pizzas took it's toll on the old ones. trying not to actually cut the pizzas on the pan so not to ruin it.

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza pan.
customer_reviews.text: Although Calphalon is normally quite expensive, this pan was actually a bargain at $17.00. Pizza crusts cooked on it are actually done to a T. They are crisp and tasty and not burned from trying to get then done in a normal pizza pan. They also slide right off the pan without sticking even though some of the cheese may have run off burned onto the pan. It came quickly and was just exactly as we ordered. Only one drawback, a small one, and that is cutting the pizza while on the pan, which one should do with care or not at all. Other than that, we are very pleased with the pan.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! I also have an older one though ...
customer_reviews.text: When I washed it, I barely had to do anything. The pizza just plain didn't stick to the pan. Excellent product! I also have an older one though (purchased in 2013) and the Cephalon has worn off from dishwasher use and scrubbing with steel wool as needed. Will be gently hand-washing the new one so that hopefully it stays awesome for longer. The pizza bakes crunchier on this pan than the kind without holes on the bottom. I have 3 of the cookie sheet style pizza pans and they just don't compare to this one. If you like firm, crunchy crusts, this is the pan for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: No need for expensive pizza stones to have your big pizza baked
customer_reviews.text: I can't say that it works as well as pizza stone (no expertise on that) but it works much better than baking it on a regular oven pan. I don't put pizza directly on a oven rack so it's always a chore when I get over 12" pizza to bake since the trays I have not big enough. It also makes it bake faster with heat getting to the pizza through the holes on that pan ( from 24 min to 18 in convection oven for some of the pizzas I had).It's light, easy to clean and looks good too.

So, I haven't used this to make handmade pizza - hope to do that in the future though. Anyway - I love the holes on the bottom. It makes the underside of the pizza crispy.
customer_reviews.author: Marlo

product_meta.title: Calphalon Nonstick Bakeware, Pizza Pan, 16-inch
product_meta.description: The Calphalon Nonstick Bakeware 16-inch Pizza Pan provides an ideal surface for baking a crisp, evenly-browned pizza. The interlocking nonstick layers are designed to prevent sticking, while the heavy-gauge steel core resists warping and heats your pizza evenly. Perforations in the pan circulate air to prevent over- and under-baking, so both homemade and store-bought frozen pizzas come out perfectly browned. And unlike most non-stick bakeware, this pizza pan is dishwasher-safe for easy cleanup.
feature_bullets: Heavy-gauge steel core won't warp and heats evenly without hot spots so your cookies and cakes come out of the oven perfectly and evenly browned.
The interior of each piece has interlocking non-stick layers that are designed to deliver long-lasting, high-performance release. Releases up to 2X better than Calphalon Classic Bakeware.
Nonstick finish is beautiful and practical.
Perforations that circulate air to give homemade or store-bought frozen pizzas a perfectly cooked crust.
Pizza pan is dishwasher-safe and protected by Calphalon's full lifetime warranty.
